messages.subject: Re: [SHQ_Spy_Division] Turtle Cosplay
messages.msgSnippet: Haha!! To make a proper Genbu unit mascot, you would probably need to add several snakes in the picture. Just kidding. Divertimento secretary
messages.messageBody:
Haha!!

To make a proper Genbu unit mascot, you would probably need to add several snakes in the picture.

Just kidding.

Divertimento

secretary <secretarytocapt3@...> wrote:
Maggie, is actually a very very old male red-eared slider
who is almost all completely black---so technically he'd be the perfect
mascot for Aizu's Genbu unit (organized for the oldest samurai during
the seige of the castle)
The Japanese fans haven't thought of this...
http://1happyturtle.com/makoto/ShinsenMaggie.jpg
and yes I know it is *sick*

messages.msgSnippet: I think it s hilarious. I have sliders myself (we ve spoken on my LJ, I believe) and they wouldn t let me do that to them in a thousand years. Maybe my

believe) and they wouldn't let me do that to them in a thousand years.

Maybe my cockatiel would though.... Hmmmmmmmmm.

messages.subject: Turtle Cosplay
messages.msgSnippet: Maggie, is actually a very very old male red-eared slider who is almost all completely black---so technically he d be the perfect mascot for Aizu s Genbu unit
messages.messageBody:
Maggie, is actually a very very old male red-eared slider
who is almost all completely black---so technically he'd be the perfect
mascot for Aizu's Genbu unit (organized for the oldest samurai during
the seige of the castle)
The Japanese fans haven't thought of this...

and yes I know it is *sick*
